ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson looks around at those who were paying attention and nods to them.  Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.  And if I can achieve that, rest

Tucson looks around at those who were paying attention and nods to them. 

=
" Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.  And if I can achieve that, =
rest assured yours will come too.  On the off chance that one of you might =
be up against me, just play along with what Magmatron demands and I will cu=
e you in on what to do next.  All we need to do is think around him.  Do th=
e exact opposite of what he may expect out of us.  Unpredictability is our =
best hope of escape.  How many more of you are willing to join us in our es=
cape plot?"

He looks down to Mach Kick with a smile.

" You're definitely =
onto something, keep up the good work."

With a gentile rub on Mach's shoul=
der, Tucson then joins Big Convoy and follows him to the chamber.

" I need=
 to ask you something, the Matrix, I fear it's in danger of corruption, is =
Dark Rodimus holding it in his possession?  If so I must be permitted to ba=
ttle him for the Matrix, so I can deliver it to more capable hands. If I do=
n't make it out, promise me you will take it to Leo Prime where it will be =
safe?"



Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Oct 10, 2011, a=
t 12:40 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
=
> > Tucson looks to Mach Kick and gently gets back to all fours to let him =
down.
> >
> > " Sorry about that. I guess I really got into my training exe=
rcises . Good
> > thing you spoke up."
> >
> > He then turns to face Big Co=
nvoy.
> >
> > " Master Yokitron trained me in both forms and then he took m=
e aside and
> > trained me a bit further than what was normally taught in t=
raining academy.
> > Nightshift was trained along side with me, and not too=
 many bots were given
> > the opportunity that we were given. I feel a bit =
incomplete, like as if I'm
> > missing a component of myself. I always foug=
ht with Nightshift beside me
> > and together we would defeat our opponents=
. And if Magmatron is believed to
> > have such training, I will have to wo=
rk extra hard to keep my head above
> > water. I know I can combat Rodimus =
but I'm not so sure I can defeat
> > Magmatron. Primus help us if he challe=
nges me. Not much scares me but,
> > going against an impossible foe, does.=
"
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> There was a nod from BIG CONVOY, "I understand. Master Yo=
kitron has a
> reputation for having well trained pupils, and I am sure tha=
t once we
> are free from this, you will be able to rejoin your comrade."
>=
 
> MACH KICK pats TUSCON on the shoulder, "Yeah, I am sure that Big over
>=
 there . . . and um maybe you now . . . will get us all out of here."
> 
> =
A few others nodded their heads around the room. Yes, others were
> paying =
attention to the conversation.
> 
> CONVOY turned and began walking towards=
 the back, "Come I will show
> you your recharging station, the night rotat=
ion is soon to begin." He
> glanced back at TUSCON, "I would imagine that t=
ommorrow you may have
> to face your first opponant."

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson looks around at those who were =
paying attention and nods to them. </div><div><br></div><div>" Freedom=
 is the right of all sentient beings.  And if I can achieve that, rest=
 assured yours will come too.  On the off chance that one of you might=
 be up against me, just play along with what Magmatron demands and I will c=
ue you in on what to do next.  All we need to do is think around him. =
 Do the exact opposite of what he may expect out of us.  Unpredic=
tability is our best hope of escape.  How many more of you are willing=
 to join us in our escape plot?"</div><div><br></div><div>He looks down to =
Mach Kick with a smile.</div><div><br></div><div>" You're definitely onto s=
omething, keep up the good work."</div><div><br></div><div>With a gentile r=
ub on Mach's shoulder, Tucson then joins Big Convoy and follows him to the =
chamber.</div><div><br></div><div>" I need to ask you something, the Matrix=
, I fear it's in danger of corruption, is Dark Rodimus holding it in his po=
ssession?  If so I must be permitted to battle him for the Matrix, so =
I can deliver it to more capable hands. If I don't make it out, promise me =
you will take it to Leo Prime where it will be safe?"</div><div><br></div><=

my.<br>
> Nightshift was trained along side with me, and not too many bo=
ts were given<br>
> the opportunity that we were given.  I feel a bit in=
complete, like as if I'm<br>
> missing a component of myself.  I always =
fought with Nightshift beside me<br>
> and together we would defeat our =
opponents.  And if Magmatron is believed to<br>

will have to work extra hard to keep my head above<br>

I can combat Rodimus but I'm not so sure I can defeat<br>

 Primus help us if he challenges me. Not much scares me but,<br>

There was =
a nod from BIG CONVOY, "I understand. Master Yokitron has a<br>
reputation =
for having well trained pupils, and I am sure that once we<br>
are free fro=
m this, you will be able to rejoin your comrade."<br>
<br>
MACH KICK pats T=
USCON on the shoulder, "Yeah, I am sure that Big over<br>
there . . . and u=
m maybe you now . . .  will get us all out of here."<br>
<br>
A few others =
nodded their heads around the room. Yes, others were<br>
paying attention t=
o the conversation.<br>
<br>
CONVOY turned and began walking towards the ba=
ck, "Come I will show<br>
you your recharging station, the night rotation i=
s soon to begin." He<br>
glanced back at TUSCON, "I would imagine that tomm=
orrow you may have<br>
to face your first opponant."<br>
